title: Massive News for Ford Stock, Rivian Stock, and Tesla Stock Investors

Learn More Fool.com contributor Parkev Tatevosian discusses what these developments could mean for Ford (F 1.69%), Rivian (RIVN -0.36%), and Tesla (TSLA -2.25%) shareholders. *Stock prices used were the afternoon prices of Jan. 22, 2024. The video was published on Jan. 24, 2024. Parkev Tatevosian, CFA has no position in any of the stocks mentioned. The Motley Fool has positions in and recommends Tesla.
